comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content:
Douglas DC-3-277B NC25684 c/n 2208 American Airlines 'Flagship Rochester' is the aircraft in the photo below, courtesy of Kemon01.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/kemon01/8533853502/in/photostream/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/batman60/8536086572/in/photostream]
Above it is depicted over New York City in a fine painting entitled "Clipper Over Manhattan" by Robert Watts.

The image as displayed here is of extremely low resolution, and the USAAF serial number can not be read.  Do you have access to the original photo from which the serial can be read?
